scripts.all: npm run update && npm run postinstall && npm run build
scripts.update: npm run update:spa && npm run update:examples
scripts.update:examples: ls -1 examples | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd examples/{} && ncu -u'
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:spa && npm run install:examples
scripts.install:examples: ls -1 examples | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd examples/{} && npm ci'
scripts.build: npm run build:spa && npm run build:examples
scripts.build:examples: ls -1 examples | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd examples/{} && npm run build'
scripts.start: cd server && (npm start & open http://localhost:5000 & wait) || :;
